name: desc
Ki Rush: Accelerated by your ki, you move with such speed you become a blur. Move two times: two Strides, two Steps, or one Stride and one Step (in either order). You gain the concealed condition during this movement and until the start of your next turn.
Ki Strike: You focus your ki into magical attacks. Make an unarmed Strike or Flurry of Blows (this doesn't change the limit on using only one flourish per turn). You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls with the Strikes, and the Strikes deal <var>var1</var>  extra damage. This damage can be any of the following types of your choice, chosen each time you Strike: force, lawful (only if you're lawful), negative, or positive.
Augment Summoning: You augment the abilities of a summoned creature. The target gains a +1 status bonus to all checks (this also applies to the creature's DCs, including its AC) for the duration of its summoning, up to 1 minute.
Call of the Grave: You fire a ray of sickening energy. Make a spell attack roll.
Charming Words: You whisper enchanting words to deflect your foe's ire. The target must attempt a Will save.
Diviner's Sight: You glimpse into the target's future. Roll a d20; when the target attempts a non-secret saving throw or skill check, it can use the number you rolled instead of rolling, and the spell ends. Alternatively, you can instead reveal the result of the die roll for one of the target's secret checks during the duration, and the spell ends. Casting it again ends any active diviner's sight you have cast, as well as any active diviner's sight on the target.
Force Bolt: You fire an unerring dart of force from your fingertips. It automatically hits and deals <var>var1</var> force damage to the target.
Hand of the Apprentice: You hurl a held melee weapon with which you are trained at the target, making a spell attack roll. On a success, you deal the weapon's damage as if you had hit with a melee Strike, but adding your spellcasting ability modifier to damage, rather than your Strength modifier. Illusory Object: Your image makes appropriate sounds, generates normal smells, and feels right to the touch. The spell gains the auditory trait. The duration increases to 1 hour.
Jump: The range becomes touch, the target changes to one touched creature, and the duration becomes 1 minute, allowing the target to jump as described whenever it takes the Leap action.
Lock: The duration increases to unlimited, but you must expend 6 gp worth of gold dust as an additional cost.
Mage Armor: You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws.
Magic Aura: You can target a creature instead of an object. When you do, you can either conceal the auras of all magic items it has or have that creature's aura appear as if it were under the effect of a spell you know.
Magic Missile: You shoot one additional missile with each action you spend.
Mending: You can target a non-magical object of 1 Bulk or less.
Negate Aroma: The range increases to 30 feet, and you can target up to 10 creatures.
Object Reading: You can learn about an event that occurred within the last month.
Personal Rain Cloud: The amount of fire resistance increases by 2.
Pest Form: You can turn into a flying creature, such as a bird, which grants you a fly Speed of 20 feet.
Phantom Pain: The damage increases by 2d4 and the persistent damage by 1d4.
Scouring Sand: Once per round when you Sustain the Spell, you can move the center of the burst to a spot within range.
Share Lore: The duration of the spell is 1 hour and you can target up to five creatures.
Shattering Gem: The gem has 5 additional HP, and the damage dealt by its detonation increases by 1d8.
Shocking Grasp: The damage increases by 1d12, and the persistent electricity damage increases by 1.
Shockwave: The area increases by 5 feet (to a 20-foot cone at 2nd level, and so on).
Sleep: The creatures fall unconscious for 1 round on a failure or 1 minute on a critical failure. They fall prone and release what they're holding, and they can't attempt Perception checks to wake up. When the duration ends, the creature is sleeping normally instead of automatically waking up.
Soothe: The amount of healing increases by 1d10+4.
Spirit Link: The number of Hit Points transferred each time increases by 2.
Tether: The tethers’ AC increases by 3 and their Hit Points increase by 10.
Ventriloquism: The spell's duration increases to 1 hour, and you can also change the tone, quality, and other aspects of your voice. Before a creature can attempt to disbelieve your illusion, it must actively attempt a Perception check or otherwise use actions to interact with the sound.
Verdant Sprout: You throw an additional seed, which grows into an additional plant within range.
Barkskin: The resistances increase by 2, and the weakness increases by 3.
Enlarge: The creature instead grows to size Huge. The status bonus to melee damage is +4 and the creature's reach increases by 10 feet (or 15 feet if the creature started out Tiny). The spell has no effect on a Huge or larger creature.
Invisibility: The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.
Remove Paralysis: The spell's range increases to 30 feet, and you can target up to 10 creatures.
Shrink: The spell can target up to 10 creatures.
Haste: You can target up to 6 creatures.
Paralyze: You can target up to 10 creatures.
Searing Light: The fire damage increases by 2d6, and the good damage against fiends and undead increases by 2d6.
Confusion: You can target up to 10 creatures.
Creation: The item is metal and can include common minerals, like feldspar or quartz.
Dimension Door: The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.
Ethereal Jaunt: You can target up to five additional willing creatures at a range of 30 feet. The duration is up to 10 minutes.
